metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2985 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 24.0.0.194 and earlier have an exploitable useafter free vulnerability in the ActionScript 3 BitmapData class. Successfulexploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2985` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 24.0.0.221ubuntu0.16.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 24.0.0.221ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '24.0.0.221ubuntu0.16.04.1').
